text: Gothic revival church with a medieval bell tower Loppersum is a village of almost 1.500 inhabitantsMunicipality of Hinte, page on Loppersum (in German) in the municipality of Hinte, East Frisia. Most of the working people have a job in the neighbouring city of Emden. ==References== ==Other external links== *Loppersum (History of Loppersum, in German, PDF, 826 kB) Category:Towns and villages in East Frisia Category:Aurich (district) Category:East Frisia stubs Category:Weser-Ems region geography stubs
title: Loppersum, Hinte
